alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Kidder; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL KIDDER, EASTERN BURLEIGH, AND WESTERN STUTSMAN COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line from 5 miles north of Menoken to 10 miles north of Crystal Springs. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Steele, Medina, Tappen, Menoken, Sterling, Cleveland, Dawson, Lake Isabel, Driscoll, Mckenzie, Crystal Springs, Chase Lake, Horsehead Lake, and Streeter Memorial. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
